Class BlackjackView

java.lang.Object
blackjack.BlackjackView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class BlackjackView extends Object implements Observer
This class represents what is needed to display the Blackjack game in the GUI
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aidin Miller

    • BlackjackView

      public BlackjackView(BoardGamesView menuView)
      Constructor for class that sets player names Player 1 and Player 2 by default
      Parameters:
      menuView - The main menu that will be used in the GUI

    • BlackjackView

      public BlackjackView(BoardGamesView mainMenu, String name1, String name2)
      Another constructor that allows for entering player names
      Parameters:
      mainMenu - The main menu that will be used in the GUI
      name1 - Name of 1st player
      name2 - Name of 2nd player
